h1: A second page, to demonstrate routing
closed-covid: Closed on monday, tuesday, wednesday, thursday,
closed-covid-2: friday midday, saturday midday et sunday midday
opening-days-lockdown2: Monday noon to Saturday noon from 12 p.m. to 1:30 p.m.
opening-hours-lockdown2: Friday evening and Saturday evening from 6.30 p.m. to 8 p.m.
closed-lockdown2: Closed Monday evening, Tuesday evening, Wednesday evening, Thursday evening and Sunday
new-hours: Due to the COVID-19 epidemic, please take note of the new restaurant opening hours below
take-away: We also inform you that we only make a selection of pizza to take away
check-menu: We invite you to consult the menu by clicking on "MENU" at the top of the website or
only-to-take-away: Due to the COVID-19 epidemic, the restaurant can only take orders to take away
delivery: You can also get delivery to your home using the Uber Eats app
menu-adapted: The restaurant menu has been adapted and only a selection of pizza is available
contact-us: Do not hesitate to contact us on 03 89 41 24 79 to order
thanks: Thank you for your understanding, we are looking forward to prepare you delicious pizzas
reopening: Our restaurant will reopen on Wednesday June 3, 2020 from midday service
reservation: Do not hesitate to contact us to make your reservations.
thanks-support: Thank you from the bottom of our hearts to all those who supported us and who ordered our dishes during lockdown !
see-u: The whole team is very impatient to finally be able to see you again !
lockdown2-declaration: Following new government measures, from October 30th 2020, the restaurant will be open on Friday, Saturday and Sunday and you will be able to pick up your orders from 6.30 p.m. to 9 p.m.
lockdown2-orders: Orders will be taken from 5:00 p.m. by phone or when you wish by Facebook Messenger, email or Instagram.
lockdown2-ubereats: You can also have it delivered directly to your house by ordering from the Uber Eats app.
lockdown2-support: Thank you for your support in these difficult times.
lockdown2-see-u: The whole team wishes you a good tasting, see you very soon !
lockdown2-promotion: We are proposing you, from December 3rd 2020 and for a limited time, great discounts on our entire take away menu ! ðŸŽ‰ðŸŽ‰
lockdown2-carte: The card with the discounts is available under this message, on our Facebook and Instagram page.
lockdown2-hours: The restaurant is open Monday to Friday from 12 p.m. to 1.30 p.m. and Friday and Saturday evenings from 6.30 p.m. to 9 p.m. You can place your orders by phone on 03 89 41 24 79 or by instant messaging on Facebook Messenger or on our Instagram page.
lockdown2-ubereats-supp: It is also possible to have it delivered to your home via the Uber Eats app at an additional cost of 30% compared to the discount.
lockdown2-plaiz: We hope to be able to please as many of our dear customers as possible with these low prices for the end of the year !
